GP12skp031iu:15: akṣṇāṃ sahasraṃ surarāṭ sa bibhrad SkP_13.9a
GP12skp031iu:82: atha vā te kṛpā devi SkP_12.47a
GP12skp031iu:266: ayaṃ ca te pitā vipraḥ SkP_25.20a
GP12skp031iu:554: idaṃ ca śṛṇu me vacaḥ SkP_25.17d
GP12skp031iu:557: idaṃ paṭhedyo hi naraḥ sadaiva SkP_12.63a
GP12skp031iu:709: umā tu yā mayā tubhyaṃ SkP_11.35a
GP12skp031iu:838: etatsmṛtaṃ priyatamaṃ mama devi nityaṃ SkP_30.75a
GP12skp031iu:916: evaṃ dagdhvā sa kāmaṃ tu SkP_15.13a
GP12skp031iu:922: evaṃ yatastāṃ na viduḥ sureśā SkP_13.25a
GP12skp031iu:1076: kāntyā ca veṣeṇa ca cārurūpaḥ SkP_13.16b
GP12skp031iu:1272: ko yogaḥ kaḥ śramaśca te SkP_20.56b
GP12skp031iu:1309: kva vā nīta iti prabhuḥ SkP_8.11d
GP12skp031iu:1358: kṣetre 'sminnivasanti ye sukṛtino bhaktāḥ sadā māṃ narāḥ SkP_29.91a
GP12skp031iu:1433: gaṇo vā tvaṃ piśāco vā SkP_26.54a
GP12skp031iu:1807: jñānaṃ ca yaḥ prahiṇoti sma tasmai SkP_3.9b
GP12skp031iu:1813: jyeṣṭhā ca sā bhavitrī te SkP_11.23e
GP12skp031iu:1902: tataḥ sa rājā svaṃ rājyam SkP_18.1a
GP12skp031iu:1904: tataḥ sa labdhvā tu varaṃ SkP_31.7a
GP12skp031iu:1911: tataḥ sā taṃ varaṃ labdhvā SkP_15.12a
GP12skp031iu:2342: taṃ devaṃ pramathapatiṃ praṇamya bhaktyā SkP_3.30c
GP12skp031iu:2403: tāṃ tu śūnyāṃ sa vijñāya SkP_26.64a
GP12skp031iu:2520: tau prabhū mama dāne vai SkP_12.8c
GP12skp031iu:2598: tvayi snānaṃ tu yaḥ kuryāc SkP_22.19a
GP12skp031iu:2614: tvaṃ no gatiḥ purā deva SkP_21.52a
GP12skp031iu:2633: dagdhena ca tvayā kiṃ me SkP_18.15c
GP12skp031iu:2734: diśantu sarvaṃ manasepsitaṃ ca me SkP_25.53c
GP12skp031iu:2780: dṛṣṭvā ca me tatra mātā SkP_26.13c
GP12skp031iu:2893: devi yo māṃ sadā smaret SkP_27.44b
GP12skp031iu:2898: devī na sasmāra vacaśca mātuḥ SkP_26.68d
GP12skp031iu:3044: na ca taṃ vedmi kenāsau SkP_8.11c
GP12skp031iu:3050: na ca muktaṃ mayā yasmād SkP_29.37c
GP12skp031iu:3500: nirmālyaṃ yo hi me nityaṃ SkP_28.37a
GP12skp031iu:3604: patnī ca śambhoḥ puruṣasya dhāmno SkP_13.24c
GP12skp031iu:3677: paśyanto 'nvahamādareṇa śucayaḥ snātāḥ sadā matparāḥ SkP_29.91b
GP12skp031iu:4144: balaṃ ca vīryaṃ sthiratāṃ ca saṃyuge SkP_25.52d
GP12skp031iu:4254: brahmaṃ ca yo vidadhe putramagre SkP_3.9a
GP12skp031iu:4302: brūhi kiṃ te dadāni te SkP_15.17d
GP12skp031iu:4303: brūhi kiṃ vā dadāni te SkP_21.16d
GP12skp031iu:4304: brūhi kiṃ vā priyaṃ te 'dya SkP_18.19c
GP12skp031iu:4384: bhava somo hi naḥ prabho SkP_14.24d
GP12skp031iu:4456: bhittvā sambhavabandhajālagahanaṃ vindanti mokṣaṃ param SkP_29.91d
GP12skp031iu:4628: mayā yadi sutā svā vai SkP_10.29c
GP12skp031iu:4746: mā khedaṃ tvaṃ vṛthā kṛthāḥ SkP_26.48d
GP12skp031iu:4758: mā te krūraḥ sa gādheyaḥ SkP_19.19c
GP12skp031iu:4760: mā duḥkhe tvaṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ SkP_18.11d
GP12skp031iu:4779: māyūraiḥ pakṣacandraiḥ kvacidapi patitai rañjitakṣmāpradeśaṃ SkP_30.35c
GP12skp031iu:5047: yaṃ devā na viduḥ kvacit SkP_13.135d
GP12skp031iu:5116: ye me bhaktāḥ sadā caiva SkP_27.39a
GP12skp031iu:5180: yo me gāstu hiraṇyaṃ vā SkP_27.15a
GP12skp031iu:5183: yo me devi sadā mūrdhni SkP_28.41c
GP12skp031iu:5220: ramyā purī mama sadā girirājaputri SkP_30.74b
GP12skp031iu:5243: rātrau candrasya bhāsā kusumitatilakairekatāṃ samprayātaṃ SkP_30.34c
GP12skp031iu:5887: śūdraḥ strī vā sa me loke SkP_28.19c
GP12skp031iu:5960: śrutvā tu devī taṃ nādaṃ SkP_12.36a
GP12skp031iu:5963: śrutvāpi na hi me tṛptir SkP_30.45c
GP12skp031iu:5964: śrutvā śabdaṃ ṛtumadakalaṃ sarvataḥ kokilānāṃ SkP_13.119a
GP12skp031iu:6033: sa ca te putratāṃ yātvā SkP_4.7a
GP12skp031iu:6036: sa ca vavre sutaṃ śubham SkP_19.8d
GP12skp031iu:6088: sa tvaṃ tathā gataḥ kuryā SkP_26.23a
GP12skp031iu:6097: sadā ca tuṣṭo bhava me SkP_25.15c
GP12skp031iu:6104: sadā sattraṃ ca pūjāṃ ca SkP_26.46c
GP12skp031iu:6182: samānarūpo na hi yasya kasyacit SkP_11.41d
GP12skp031iu:6209: sa me sadā syādgaṇapo variṣṭhas SkP_22.34c
GP12skp031iu:6525: sākāśaṃ dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca SkP_9.19a
GP12skp031iu:6544: sādhyaiśca viśvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ stutaṃ ca SkP_4.41d
GP12skp031iu:6649: sṛṣṭvā tā vai visṛjya ca SkP_29.236b
GP12skp031iu:6941: hṛtaḥ somo hi naḥ prabho SkP_8.9b
